name: Electivehw4
body:
###Task  
In this assignment, you will write a simple chasing strategy.  

![reference picture](https://s31.postimg.org/ufgr0i8or/001.png)  

Your enemy will chase after player as well as avoide the obstacles.    



**Here are some references:**   
http://docs.unity3d.com/Manual/Navigation.html   
https://www.raywenderlich.com/4946/introduction-to-a-pathfinding
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
